SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: PÃ¡gina 53
Translation from PROLOG(ASP) to PROLEG
Theorem 2 Let P be a PROLOG program and tro(P) be a PRO-
LEG program obtained by the above translation. Then, there is
an answer set M of P if and only if there is an extension of
tro(P) such that a set deleting newly introduced predicates from
the extension equals to M.
So this means that representation power of PROLEG is the
same as that of PROLOG.
53
speaker: SYSTEM
